query.queryString: (/article/relations/categories/collection/code='resultsPack,projectsInfoPack,brief' OR (/result/relations/categories/collection/code='deliverable,publication' OR contenttype='project')) AND ('SUSTAINABILITY' OR 'INNOVATION' OR 'MULTI-CRITERIA')

result.title: Short report on main outcomes and participating organisations of the workshop on approaches to constraining climate sensitivity and integrating new insights on climate sensitivity
result.description: D43 M24 UNIVLEEDS ETH MPG STOCKHOLM Short report on main outcomes and participating organisations of the workshop for the scientific community on the various approaches to constrain climate sensitivity and integrating new insights on climate sensitivity developed by the midterm of the project in WPs 13 Participants of this two day workshop will include 7 CONSTRAIN scientists and 2 international participants for whom costs will be covered by the programme and up to 9 other participants who will be expected to cover their own travel accommodation and subsistence costs Task 422

result.title: Final CONSTRAIN summary input into the global stocktake
result.description: D5.10 (M44, CLIMATE ANALYTICS): Final CONSTRAIN summary input into the Global Stocktake. Whenever appropriate opportunities arise within the UNFCCC policy process leading up to the 2023 Global Stocktake. Depending on the modalities of the Global Stocktake process this deliverable could occur between M36 – M48 (Task 5.2.1).

result.title: End-of-project KGSIR on the improved physical understanding and quantification of tropical low-cloud feedbacks
result.description: D2.4 (M48, CNRS, MPG, TU DELFT): End-of-project KGSIR on the improved physical understanding and quantification of tropical low-cloud feedbacks (Task 2.2 and 2.3 and all related subtasks), and their implications for WP-4 by revisiting the plausible range of climate sensitivity estimates in the light of new observational constraints.
